title: FS/T T213 Type 1, T209 Color , T227, T205 Tinker
author: bigfanNY

posts.post_title: FS/T T213 Type 1, T209 Color , T227, T205 Tinker
posts.post_content:
Got these back and they are up for offers before the go to Ebay. 
T213 type 1, Ira Thomas PSA 1.5 Fair Very tough card. SOLD
 T209 Color Hoffman 1st series PSA 2 Moved to Ebay 
T227 Marquard PSA 2 No longer available
T205 Tinker PSA 3 SOLD (top end of grade)

Includes shipping payment via paypal
* 2 1956 Topps Hocus Focus in 1950-1979  thread

Thanks for looking 
Jonathan

last scan 
t205 Tinker PSA 3 Top of grade (small cr lower Rght corner) Sharp Borders
No surprise the T213 type 1 went quick. Open to offers on others listed.

last bump will move to all except the T-227 to Ebay in one week.

Thanks for looking
Jonathan
